column4: BRIEF-Envestnet announces pricing of convertible notes offering
column6: * ENVESTNET, INC. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF CONVERTIBLE NOTES OFFERING
column7: * HAS PRICED AN OFFERING OF $300 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 1.75% CONVERTIBLE NOTES DUE 2023
column8: * NOTES WILL MATURE ON JUNE 1, 2023, UNLESS EARLIER PURCHASED, REDEEMED OR CONVERTED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
